text: The Cape Cod Regional Law Enforcement Council is a regional mutual aid facilitator formed by 43 police agencies in the area on or near Cape Cod, Massachusetts. It pools resources to provide SWAT, a Motor Vehicle Crash Reconstruction Team, a School Resource Officers’ Network and other units in the area. Agencies that belong to the group include: ==References== Category:Cape Cod and the Islands Category:Law enforcement in Massachusetts
title: Cape Cod Regional Law Enforcement Council
